00027 GrPortal::GrPortal( UReader& reader )
00028 {
00029         Load( reader );

00032 //----------------------------------------------------------
00033 GrPortal::GrPortal( const MPlane& plane, const VertexArray& polygon )
00034 : _polygon( polygon )
00035 {
00037         B_ASSERT( polygon.GetElemCount() >= 3 );
00038 
00040         unsigned int vertexCount = polygon.GetElemCount();
00041         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < vertexCount; ++i )
00042         {
00043                 float dist = plane.Dist( _polygon[ i ] );
00044                 _polygon[ i ] -= dist * plane.GetNormal();
00045                 B_ASSERT( plane.Dist( _polygon[ i ] ) < 0.1f );
00046         }
00047 }

00054 //----------------------------------------------------------
00055 bool
00056 GrPortal::IsCoplanar( const MPlane& plane, float epsilon ) const
00057 {
00060         unsigned int vertexCount = GetVertexCount();
00061         B_ASSERT( vertexCount >= 3 );
00062         for ( unsigned int i = 2; i < vertexCount; ++i )
00063         {
00065                 if ( Abs( plane.Dist( _polygon[ i ] ) ) > epsilon )
00066                         return false;
00067         }
00068 
00070         return true;
00071 }
00072 
00073 //----------------------------------------------------------
00074 bool
00075 GrPortal::IsDegenerate() const
00076 {
00078         float area = 0.0f;
00079         unsigned int vertexCount = GetVertexCount();
00080         B_ASSERT( vertexCount >= 3 );
00081         for ( unsigned int i = 2; i < vertexCount; ++i )
00082         {
00084                 MVec3 edge0 = _polygon[ i - 1 ] - _polygon[ i - 2 ];
00085                 MVec3 edge1 = _polygon[ i - 0 ] - _polygon[ i - 2 ];
00086 
00089                 if ( edge0.MagSqr() <= 0.0001f || edge1.MagSqr() <= 0.0001f )
00090                         continue;
00091 
00093                 float sinTheta = edge0.Normalized().Cross( edge1.Normalized() ).Mag();
00094                 area += 0.5f * Abs( sinTheta ) * edge0.Mag() * edge1.Mag();
00095         }
00096 
00097         return area < 0.1f;
00098 }

00101 int
00102 GrPortal::Split( GrPortal& front, GrPortal& back, const MPlane& splitPlane, const MPlane& orgPlane, float epsilon ) const
00103 {
00105         front._polygon.Clear();
00106         back._polygon.Clear();
00107 
00109         unsigned int vertexCount = GetVertexCount();
00110         B_ASSERT( vertexCount >= 3 );
00111 
00112         int lastSide = 0;
00113         unsigned int vert = 0;
00114         while ( lastSide == 0 && vert < vertexCount )
00115                 lastSide = splitPlane.GetSide( _polygon[ vert++ ], epsilon );
00116 
00119         if ( lastSide == 0 )
00120         {
00121                 front = *this;
00122                 back = *this;
00123                 return 0;
00124         }
00125 
00128 //      unsigned int frontVertCount = 0;
00129 //      unsigned int backVertCount = 0;
00130 //      unsigned int maxArraySize = vertexCount + 10;
00131         for ( unsigned int i = 1; i <= vertexCount; ++i )
00132         {
00133                 unsigned int curVert = i % vertexCount;
00134 
00136                 int side = splitPlane.GetSide( _polygon[ curVert ], epsilon );
00137                 vert = 0;
00138                 while ( side == 0 && vert < vertexCount )
00139                 {
00140                         side = splitPlane.GetSide( _polygon[ ( curVert + vert ) % vertexCount ], epsilon );
00141                         ++vert;
00142                 }
00143 
00145                 B_ASSERT( side != 0 );
00146 
00150                 if ( side != lastSide )
00151                 {
00152                         unsigned int prevVert = i - 1;
00153                         float d0 = splitPlane.Dist( _polygon[ prevVert ] );
00154                         float d1 = splitPlane.Dist( _polygon[ curVert ] );
00155 
00159                         if ( Abs( d1 ) < epsilon )
00160                         {
00162                                 front._polygon.Push( _polygon[ curVert ] );
00163                                 back._polygon.Push( _polygon[ curVert ] );
00164                                 lastSide = side;
00165 
00168                                 continue;
00169                         }
00170                         else
00171                         {
00174                                 float t = Abs( d0 ) / ( Abs( d0 ) + Abs( d1 ) );
00175                                 MVec3 newVert = Lerp( _polygon[ prevVert ], _polygon[ curVert ], t );
00176 
00178                                 front._polygon.Push( newVert );
00179                                 back._polygon.Push( newVert );
00180                         }
00181 
00183                         lastSide = side;
00184                 }
00185 
00187                 if ( side == 1 )
00188                 {
00189                         front._polygon.Push( _polygon[ curVert ] );
00190                 }
00191                 else
00192                 {
00193                         B_ASSERT( side == -1 );
00194                         back._polygon.Push( _polygon[ curVert ] );
00195                 }
00196         }
00197 
00200         B_ASSERT( front._polygon.GetElemCount() >= 3 || front._polygon.GetElemCount() == 0 );
00201         B_ASSERT( back._polygon.GetElemCount() >= 3 || back._polygon.GetElemCount() == 0 );
00202 
00205         int ret = 0;
00206         if ( front._polygon.GetElemCount() )
00207                 ret += 1;
00208         if ( back._polygon.GetElemCount() )
00209                 ret -= 1;
00210 
00212         return ret;

00215         VertexArray backArray;

00263 //----------------------------------------------------------
00264 void
00265 GrPortal::ReverseWinding()
00266 {
00267         B_ASSERT( _polygon.GetElemCount() >= 3 );
00268         unsigned int vertexCount = _polygon.GetElemCount();
00269         unsigned int loopCount = vertexCount >> 1;
00270         for ( unsigned int i = 0, j = vertexCount-1; i < loopCount; ++i, --j )
00271                 Swap( _polygon[ i ], _polygon[ j ] );
00272 }
00273 
00274 //----------------------------------------------------------
00275 unsigned int
00276 GrPortal::GetVertexCount() const
00277 {
00278         B_ASSERT( _polygon.GetElemCount() >= 3 );
00279         return _polygon.GetElemCount();
00280 }
00281 
00282 //----------------------------------------------------------
00283 const MVec3&
00284 GrPortal::GetVertex( unsigned int idx ) const
00285 {
00286         B_ASSERT( _polygon.GetElemCount() >= 3 );
00287         B_ASSERT( idx < _polygon.GetElemCount() );
00288         return _polygon[ idx ];
00289 }

00309 //----------------------------------------------------------
00310 void
00311 GrPortal::Save( UWriter& writer )
00312 {
00314         const unsigned int vertexCount = _polygon.GetElemCount();
00315         writer.WriteUInt( vertexCount );
00316         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < vertexCount; ++i )
00317                 _polygon[ i ].Save( writer );
00318 }
00319 
00320 //----------------------------------------------------------
00321 void
00322 GrPortal::Load( UReader& reader )
00323 {
00325         const unsigned int vertexCount = reader.ReadUInt();
00326         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < vertexCount; ++i )
00327                 _polygon.Push().Load( reader );
00328 }
